title: 105_hr4418
content: Same Insurance as Congress Act of 1998 - Requires any carrier of a plan approved under the Federal Employees Health Benefits Program to offer health insurance to individuals who are not eligible: (1) to be enrolled in a group health plan. Or (2) for Medicare, Medicaid, or Children's Health Insurance Program benefits under the Social Security Act. Sets forth provisions concerning premiums, contributions, benefits, and the exclusion of a carrier or plan. Terminates the provisions of this Act ten years after enactment.
